vlive.korean: '양손잡이면 어떤 손 쓸지 어떻게 골라요?' "If you're ambidextrous, how do you choose which hand to use?" 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 리노리방😺하이요~~
vlive.english: "If you're ambidextrous, how do you choose which hand to use?"

vlive.korean: 이거를 어떻게 쓸지 회의를 하는 와중에! We discussed how to wear it. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [AB6IX] 휘오니소스와 함께 내적 흥이 차올랐는데🔥 정신 차리고 보니 휘오니소스가 없었어요!!!∑(ﾟﾛﾟ!)??? (Daehwi Singing songs)
vlive.english: We discussed how to wear it.

vlive.korean: 이걸 언제 쓸지 모르겠는 거예요. I never know when I'll use it. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST W] L.O.Λ.E RECORD B-Side EP.15 왕이 된 JR, 그가 선택한 미션은?
vlive.english: I never know when I'll use it.

vlive.korean: 이거 언제 쓸지 몰라요 - 진짜? You never know when I'll actually use this. - Really? 듣기 View video NCT DREAM : [FULL] !t Live(잇라이브) : The 9th MUGI-BOX(뮤기박스) “NCT DREAM”
vlive.english: You never know when I'll actually use this. - Really?

vlive.korean: 뭐 쓸지 궁금하시죠 여러분? You are curious about what I'm going to write, right? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] 아로니지론👻👻
vlive.english: You are curious about what I'm going to write, right?

examples.korean: Time is the coin of your life. It is the only coin you have, and only you can determine how it will be spent. Be careful lest you let other people spend it for you. (Carl Sandburg) 발음듣기 시간은 인생의 동전이다. 시간은 네가 가진 유일한 동전이고, 그 동전을 어디에 쓸지는 너만이 결정할 수 있다. 네 대신 타인이 그 동전을 써버리지 않도록 주의하라. (칼 샌드버그, 시간명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Time is the coin of your life. It is the only coin you have, and only you can determine how it will be spent. Be careful lest you let other people spend it for you. (Carl Sandburg) 발음

examples.korean: We can't decide whether to use tile or linoleum floor coverings in the cabin we're building. 발음듣기 현재 짓고 있는 별장 바닥에 타일을 쓸지 리놀륨을 쓸지 결정을 못 하겠다. Neungyule
examples.english: We can't decide whether to use tile or linoleum floor coverings in the cabin we're building. 발음

examples.korean: I haven’t even decided what I’m writing mine on. 발음듣기 나는 아직 뭐에 대해서 쓸지도 결정 못했거든요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I haven’t even decided what I’m writing mine on. 발음

examples.korean: You never know what kind of a story they'll write. 발음듣기 그 사람들이 무슨 기사를 쓸지는 아무도 모르는 거니까요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You never know what kind of a story they'll write. 발음

examples.korean: A committee chooses what to put on the sign. 발음듣기 한 위원회가 간판에 무엇을 쓸지 선정한다. Neungyule
examples.english: A committee chooses what to put on the sign. 발음
